# Jarvis Home

My personal AI assistant configuration, documentation, and experiments.

## Documentation

*   [OpenClaw Guide (OpenClaw 指南)](./openclaw-guide.md) - Core capabilities, system configuration, and personalized setup.
*   [OpenClaw Reminders PDF](./openclaw_reminders.pdf) - 主动提醒机制与当前任务列表（PDF）。

## Projects

*   **Antigravity Dashboard**: A real-time stock and weather dashboard generated by the agent.
*   **Feishu Bridge**: A custom skill to connect Feishu bots to OpenClaw.
